item.name: Ross Estate Wines
item.description: Darius and Pauline Ross laid the foundation for Ross Estate Wines when they purchased a vineyard that included two blocks of 75- and 90-year-old grenache. Also included were blocks of 30-year-old riesling and semillon, and 14-year-old merlot; plantings of chardonnay,?sauvignon blanc, cabernet sauvignon, cabernet franc, shiraz and tempranillo have followed. Exports to the UK, the US, Canada, Denmark, Germany, Hong Kong and China.
